name: Lamplight (cricketHunter, AbnerSquared, HairbobbleSoundDesign)
description:
Traverse a procedurally generated dungeon as a feeble oil lamp.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left-Click: Attack

How to play:

Attacking, getting hit, even walking will drain your precious oil. Don't end up EMPTY or it's game over.

 Find recharge stations scattered throughout the dungeon to refill oil while you look for the level exit.
